verses.verse: <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> my <S%H6697>rock,<s%> who <S%H3925>teaches<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H7128>war,<s%> and my <S%H676>fingers<s%> to <S%H4421>battle:<s%>

my loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> my <S%H4686>fortress,<s%> my high <S%H4869>tower,<s%> my <S%H6403>deliverer,<s%> my <S%H4043>shield,<s%> and he in whom I take <S%H2620>refuge;<s%> who <S%H7286>subdues<s%> my people under <S%H5971>me.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> what is <S%H120>man,<s%> that you <S%H3045>care<s%> for <S%H1121>him?<s%> Or the son of <S%H582>man,<s%> that you think of <S%H2803>him?<s%>
<S%H120>Man<s%> is <S%H1819>like<s%> a <S%H1892>breath.<s%> His <S%H3117>days<s%> are like a <S%H6738>shadow<s%> that passes <S%H5674>away.<s%>
<S%H5186>Part<s%> your <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and come <S%H3381>down.<s%> <S%H5060>Touch<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and they will <S%H6225>smoke.<s%>
Throw <S%H1299>out<s%> <S%H1300>lightning,<s%> and <S%H6327>scatter<s%> <S%H7971>them.<s%> Send out your <S%H2671>arrows,<s%> and rout <S%H2000>them.<s%>

<S%H7971>Stretch<s%> out your <S%H3027>hand<s%> from <S%H4791>above,<s%> <S%H5337>rescue<s%> <S%H5337>me,<s%> and deliver me out of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H5236>of<s%> <S%H1121>foreigners;<s%>
whose <S%H6310>mouths<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7723>deceit,<s%> Whose right <S%H3225>hand<s%> is a right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of <S%H8267>falsehood.<s%>
I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> to <S%H430>you,<s%> God. On a <S%H6218>ten-stringed<s%> <S%H5035>lyre,<s%> I will sing praises to <S%H2167>you.<s%>
You are he who <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H8668>salvation<s%> to <S%H4428>kings,<s%> who <S%H6475>rescues<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> from the <S%H7451>deadly<s%> <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

<S%H6475>Rescue<s%> <S%H5337>me,<s%> and deliver me out of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H5236>of<s%> <S%H1121>foreigners,<s%> whose <S%H6310>mouths<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7723>deceit,<s%> whose right <S%H3225>hand<s%> is a right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of <S%H8267>falsehood.<s%>

Then our <S%H1121>sons<s%> will be like <S%H1431>well-nurtured<s%> <S%H5195>plants,<s%> <S%H5271><s%> our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> like <S%H2106>pillars<s%> <S%H2404>carved<s%> to <S%H8403>adorn<s%> a <S%H1964>palace.<s%>

Our <S%H4200>barns<s%> are <S%H4392>full,<s%> filled with all <S%H6329>kinds<s%> of <S%H2177>provision.<s%> Our <S%H6629>sheep<s%> bring forth <S%H503>thousands<s%> and ten <S%H503>thousands<s%> in our <S%H2351>fields.<s%>
Our <S%H441>oxen<s%> will pull heavy <S%H5445>loads.<s%> There is no breaking <S%H6556>in,<s%> and no going <S%H3318>away,<s%> and no <S%H6682>outcry<s%> in our <S%H7339>streets.<s%>
<S%H835>Happy<s%> are the <S%H5971>people<s%> who are in such a <S%H3602>situation.<s%> <S%H835>Happy<s%> are the <S%H5971>people<s%> whose <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
